title.value: V2 Table Code System: Container Common Name

description.value: Codes created by an organization as a shorthand way to express a combination of container attributes; for example the combination of SAC-47 (Container Form) of “Tube/vial” + SAC-48 (Container Material) of “Glass” + SAC-27 (Additive) of “EDTA” may be referenced commonly in an organization as a “Lavender Top”, e.g.: • Lavender Top • Wet Mount (slides for parasitology) • LJ plate (for Mycobacterium cultures)

purpose.value: Underlying Master Code System for V2 table 0969 (Container Common Name)

copyright.value: Copyright HL7. Licensed under creative commons public domain

description.value: Version of HL7 in which the code was deprecated
